sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import SideNav, { Toggle, Nav, Dropdown, Button, MenuItem, NavItem, NavIcon, NavText } from '@trendmicro/react-sidenav' import "@trendmicro/react-sidenav/dist/react-sidenav.css" export default class Navigator extends Component { state = { selected: 'home', expanded: false, }; onSelect = (selected) => { this.setState({ selected: selected }); }; onToggle = (expanded) => { this.state({ expanded: expanded }) } navigate = (pathname) => () => { this.setState({ selected: pathname }); }; page = { 'home': ['Home'], 'rentals/listings': ['Rentals', 'Listings'], 'rentals/userlistings': ['Rentals', 'Userlistings'], 'info/faq': ['Info', 'faq'], 'info/tnq': ['Info', 'tnq'], } renderBreadcrumbs() { const { selected } = this.state; const list = ensureArray(this.pageTitle[selected]); return ( {list.map((item, index) => ( {item} ))} ); } render() { const { expanded, selected } = this.state; return (
Rentals Listings < MenuItem onClick={this.navigate('rentals/userlistings')}> Your Listings Information F.A.Q Terms And Conditions
Home Listings Listings Frequently Asked Questions Terms And Conditions
); } }
